My passion is helping to build great companies, products, and services. I work with early stage startups to help prepare them for growth and investment. I have a proven track record of clarifying a vision and inspiring and engaging a team around that vision.I combine business acumen with technical expertise to help develop and refine pitch decks, financial models, technical strategy, and business plans; and I serve as Advisor or Interim CTO for growing companies.
140plus is an astonishingly efficient publishing / blogging platform for Twitter to make it easier than ever to make the most out of social media for your business.

David launched TelEvolution Inc. in July 2005 and oversaw development of the patent-pending PhoneGnome technology and business model, securing angel financing, establishing a world class advisory board, and recruiting a seasoned executive team. Beckemeyer secured TelEvolution's strategic relationship with Linksys/Cisco and retail distribution of PhoneGnome. Most recently, Beckemeyer led the successful deployment of PhoneGnome around the globe, including the Americas, Europe, Asia, and the Middle East.TelEvolution Inc. currently operates as a private virtual innovation incubator and intellectual property holding company.

Mike Smith
Sr. IT Project Manager at Anritsu
July 28, 2009, Mike was a client of David’s

I worked with David on a number of projects thru mid-90's that enabled my company to transition from systems integration (document/film scanning equipment) to one of the premier high-volume document and media conversion service providers.  It was David's ability to listen to customer needs and his technical vision that resulted in delivery of a scaleable, full-featured document image conversion/production system.   In one noteworthy case, we were engaged by a customer who had taken three years to scan half of their employee files - with David's innovation, we were able to scan and deliver the remaining  employee files (~2M images) in only six months. David's system enabled us to make the transition from an engineering-oriented systems integrator that provided specialised document scanning services to a full service document conversion company capable of delivering millions of document images per month.
